description.value: Susan Pevensie wishes everything could be sensible and normal, but it's not. The world is at war, and she and her brothers and sister are far from home. When Susan finds herself in the enchanged land of Narnia and in great danger, it is almost too much to bear.

entries.title: The Chronicles of Narnia: The Lion, the witch and the wardrobe.
The Tortured Planet  Specially Abridged by the Author
Le prince Caspian le voyage de Lucy
The Lion, the Witch And The Wardrobe

description.value: Prince Rilian, Caspian's beloved son, has mysteriously disappeared, and Jill and Eustace are brought into Narnia by Aslan, the great lion, to find them. But an evil enchantress has dire plans for the prince, and for Narnia.

entries.title: The Horse and His Boy CD
The Dark Tower, and Other Stories
Le lion, la sorcière blanche et l'armoire magique
The Chronicles of Narnia- The Magician's Nephew, The Lion the Witch and the Wardrobe, The Horse and His Boy, Prince Caspian, The Voyage of the Dawn Treader, The Silver Chair, The Last Battle
Literary Impact of the Authorized Version
The Horse and his boy, by C S Lewis

description.value: Bree, the talking horse, has been kidnapped from Narnia, and longs to return. Shasta decides to run away with him. Before they know it, they are on a dangerous journey together, through strange cities, tombs and harsh deserts.

entries.title: The Problem of Pain CD Low Price

description.value: When evil comes to Narnia, Jill and Eustace help fight the great last battle and Aslan leads his people to a glorious new paradise.

entries.title: The Timeless writings of C.S. Lewis

description.value: Selected from sermons delivered by C. S. Lewis during World War II, these nine addresses offer guidance and inspiration in a time of great doubt.These are ardent and lucid sermons that provide a compassionate vision of Christianity.  from Amazon.com

Four English schoolchildren find their way through the back of a wardrobe into the magic land of Narnia and assist Aslan, the golden lion, to triumph over the White Witch, who has cursed the land with eternal winter.

entries.title: The Chronicles of Narnia - U.K. Box Set
Lion, the Witch and the Wardrobe
